Name: smelting of copper concentrate, sulfide ore | sulfuric acid | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
Description: Based on the mix of smelter types in operation nationally in 2002; assumed here to represent the current smelter technology mix: Isasmelt–Peirce–Smith furnace, 36.4%; and Noranda–Teniente furnace, 63.6%.
